casebody.data:
Wray
v.
City of Greensboro 255A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 10, 2016 Kenneth R. Keller, Attorney at Law, Mark K. York, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Wray, David. Alan W. Duncan, Attorney at Law, Stephen M. Russell, Jr., Attorney at Law, Patrick M. Kane, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for City of Greensboro. Lorin J. Lapidus, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, Kimberly S. Hibbard, General Counsel, Gregory F. Schwitzgebel, III, Associate General Counsel, for N.C. League of Municipalities.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th of August 2016 by N.C. League of Municipalities for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of August 2016."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
